character_skills.localised_description: The unquenchable thirst for blood is indiscriminate; prey and kin alike are fair game.

character_skills.localised_description: Fur-clad, matted with offal and detritus, their weathered hides are a foul carapace.

localised_description.last_approved_text: At the head of the warherd, he whips his followers into a frothing furore, then unleashes them upon the enemy.

character_skills.localised_description: At the head of the warherd, he whips his followers into a frothing furore, then unleashes them upon the enemy.

localised_description.last_approved_text: In fitful dreams, he sees the end. The world collapsing in on itself, leaving nothing but ashes and aberration.

character_skills.localised_description: In fitful dreams, he sees the end. The world collapsing in on itself, leaving nothing but ashes and aberration.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The stench of raw, rotten meat causes others to balk, but the warherd revels in the flesh and brawn.

character_skills.localised_description: The stench of raw, rotten meat causes others to balk, but the warherd revels in the flesh and brawn.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Men hear the howls and roars of the monsters beyond, and feel the fear in their bones.

character_skills.localised_description: Men hear the howls and roars of the monsters beyond, and feel the fear in their bones.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Khazrak knows nature, he knows the world. He sees, knows and is prepared. Mankind cannot best Khazrak.

character_skills.localised_description: Khazrak knows nature, he knows the world. He sees, knows and is prepared. Mankind cannot best Khazrak.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Unknowingly, the Beastmen serve their dark and Ruinous Gods, who in turn bless their every action.

character_skills.localised_description: Unknowingly, the Beastmen serve their dark and Ruinous Gods, who in turn bless their every action.

localised_description.last_approved_text: "We feel it. We all feel it. The pull to war. The tug of battle. The NEED to kill."

character_skills.localised_description: "We feel it. We all feel it. The pull to war. The tug of battle. The NEED to kill."

localised_description.last_approved_text: With the servants of Chaos comes the corruption - as the landscape twists, this one speeds the transformation.

character_skills.localised_description: With the servants of Chaos comes the corruption - as the landscape twists, this one speeds the transformation.

localised_description.last_approved_text: This willing servant of the Ruinous Powers has a resilience that is beyond any mortal measure.

character_skills.localised_description: This willing servant of the Ruinous Powers has a resilience that is beyond any mortal measure.

localised_description.last_approved_text: They bray beneath the weird, green moon, and do their perverse, grim butchery in the name of the heretical Gods.

character_skills.localised_description: They bray beneath the weird, green moon, and do their perverse, grim butchery in the name of the heretical Gods.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Lordship to the mighty! Power to the strong! Obedience is earned through bloody victory!

character_skills.localised_description: Lordship to the mighty! Power to the strong! Obedience is earned through bloody victory!

localised_description.last_approved_text: For those who face the warherd, a fate worse than death awaits their salivating jaws and unremitting bloodlust.

character_skills.localised_description: For those who face the warherd, a fate worse than death awaits their salivating jaws and unremitting bloodlust.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Brought into this world by the cataclysm of Chaos, Beastmen are the very image of a dread future.

character_skills.localised_description: Brought into this world by the cataclysm of Chaos, Beastmen are the very image of a dread future.

character_skills.localised_description: Even when not feasting, the Beastmen taste blood on their lips, smell it on their fur, and want for more.

character_skills.localised_description: The ground shakes. The earth moves. The spirit trembles. The Beastman comes.

localised_description.last_approved_text: When the warherd gathers, there is much feasting, debauchery, and revelling in mania and depravity.

character_skills.localised_description: When the warherd gathers, there is much feasting, debauchery, and revelling in mania and depravity.

character_skills.localised_description: The Beastman's fury stretches back before most can remember - they pursue their hatred with single-minded zeal.

character_skills.localised_description: The world of man will fall at the Beastlord's hand, with every glittering city reduced to rubble and despair.

character_skills.localised_description: With a base howl, the beast radiates strength and power, a warning to his enemies that death is coming.

character_skills.localised_description: The desire to wreak havoc is innate, brought about not by choice but by sheer force of being.

character_skills.localised_description: No beast can truly be controlled, but these desperate contrivances bring the smallest semblance of order.

character_skills.localised_description: Carved into this battered and dishevelled stone is the mark of violent rage and sanguine desire.

character_skills.localised_description: "The blood is the prize. The blood is the prize! THE BLOOD IS THE PRIZE!"

character_skills.localised_description: The Beastman delights in constant fighting; in vicious, ceaseless brutality. It gives him purpose.

character_skills.localised_description: Mutations awarded by the Chaos Gods to their followers may look horrific to southerners, but such gifts are prized.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The followers of Chaos need not to rest, they march on with iron hearts desperate to harvest souls.

character_skills.localised_description: The followers of Chaos need not to rest, they march on with iron hearts desperate to harvest souls.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The legions march forth under the Lord's inscrutable gaze, eager to kill for fear of his wrath.

character_skills.localised_description: The legions march forth under the Lord's inscrutable gaze, eager to kill for fear of his wrath.

localised_description.last_approved_text: This Chaos Lord expects his charioteers to harvest many souls for the consumption of the Dark Powers.

character_skills.localised_description: This Chaos Lord expects his charioteers to harvest many souls for the consumption of the Dark Powers.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Knights of Chaos are a boon for any Lord ready to despoil, for that is the will of the Dark Gods.

character_skills.localised_description: The Knights of Chaos are a boon for any Lord ready to despoil, for that is the will of the Dark Gods.

localised_description.last_approved_text: This Lord speaks with a dread booming voice - a gift from his Dark Masters to ensure obedience.

character_skills.localised_description: This Lord speaks with a dread booming voice - a gift from his Dark Masters to ensure obedience.

localised_description.last_approved_text: With the servants of Chaos comes the corruption - as the landscape twists, this one speeds the transformation.

character_skills.localised_description: With the servants of Chaos comes the corruption - as the landscape twists, this one speeds the transformation.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Dark Apothecaries mix their fell unguents, ensuring those that can continue to serve.

character_skills.localised_description: The Dark Apothecaries mix their fell unguents, ensuring those that can continue to serve.

localised_description.last_approved_text: To despoil, to corrupt and ruin, to break the mortals and take their gods from them - this is what Chaos wants.

character_skills.localised_description: To despoil, to corrupt and ruin, to break the mortals and take their gods from them - this is what Chaos wants.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The masses flock to the Lord of Chaos - a dread time will soon fall on the weaklings in the south.

character_skills.localised_description: The masses flock to the Lord of Chaos - a dread time will soon fall on the weaklings in the south.

localised_description.last_approved_text: "This stinking mortal Hold will fall, my masters have foreseen it. Bring them ruin!"

character_skills.localised_description: "This stinking mortal Hold will fall, my masters have foreseen it. Bring them ruin!"

localised_description.last_approved_text: "You will serve me, wretch, or you will die, there is no other option."

character_skills.localised_description: "You will serve me, wretch, or you will die, there is no other option."

localised_description.last_approved_text: A Lord that was once part of the tribes - one who rode the great Norscan migrations - can summon his kin.

character_skills.localised_description: A Lord that was once part of the tribes - one who rode the great Norscan migrations - can summon his kin.

localised_description.last_approved_text: This willing servant of the Ruinous Powers has a resilience that is beyond any mortal measure.

character_skills.localised_description: This willing servant of the Ruinous Powers has a resilience that is beyond any mortal measure.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Warriors of Chaos are the playthings of Gods and given many gifts, including formidable fighting skills.

character_skills.localised_description: The Warriors of Chaos are the playthings of Gods and given many gifts, including formidable fighting skills.

localised_description.last_approved_text: "I am no god's tool. Yet, I am Chosen, for there is no other that thirsts for the end as much as I."

character_skills.localised_description: "I am no god's tool. Yet, I am Chosen, for there is no other that thirsts for the end as much as I."

localised_description.last_approved_text: Dorghar is the Steed of the Apocalypse, a gift from the Chaos Gods themselves to their ultimate champion.

character_skills.localised_description: Dorghar is the Steed of the Apocalypse, a gift from the Chaos Gods themselves to their ultimate champion.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Archaon is Lord of the End Times, crowned by Be'lakor, a creature of abeyance that's neither shape nor shadow.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Dwarfs are not fast, yet they will soldier on, always moving despite any hazards encountered.

character_skills.localised_description: Dwarfs are resolute - once they commit to charging the foe, they put all their strength behind that initial blow.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The endless courage of the Warrior God, directed to bolster this Dawi’s own reserves.

localised_description.last_approved_text: No matter which urk comes to take the Holds, this Dawi will have none of it!

character_skills.localised_description: No matter which urk comes to take the Holds, this Dawi will have none of it!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Engineers on campaign like to confound the foe by sabotaging and stealing enemy armies' equipment and resources.

character_skills.localised_description: Engineers on campaign like to confound the foe by sabotaging and stealing enemy armies' equipment and resources.

localised_description.last_approved_text: "It's weakening, send in the Engineers!"

character_skills.localised_description: "It's weakening, send in the Engineers!"

localised_description.last_approved_text: The more lethal contraptions are used outside the Engineers' Guild's purview - it's generally "not the done thing".

character_skills.localised_description: The more lethal contraptions are used outside the Engineers' Guild's purview - it's generally "not the done thing".

localised_description.last_approved_text: "It'll take more than that to finish me off, lad."

character_skills.localised_description: "It'll take more than that to finish me off, lad."

localised_description.last_approved_text: Born and bred in a Dwarfhold, as stern and pure as the stone in the deeps.

character_skills.localised_description: Born and bred in a Dwarfhold, as stern and pure as the stone in the deeps.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Master Engineers are always looking for efficiencies and improvements, especially in logistics.

character_skills.localised_description: Master Engineers are always looking for efficiencies and improvements, especially in logistics.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A Dawi Engineer can build anything with the right materials, if the price is right.

character_skills.localised_description: A Dawi Engineer can build anything with the right materials, if the price is right.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Using surveying equipment, this Dwarf knows the best places to look and lodes to glean.

character_skills.localised_description: Using surveying equipment, this Dwarf knows the best places to look and lodes to glean.

localised_description.last_approved_text: An Engineer is also the best at breaking things - he can literally put a spanner in the works.

character_skills.localised_description: An Engineer is also the best at breaking things - he can literally put a spanner in the works.

localised_description.last_approved_text: "If you swing here, at the height of the parabolic angle, you'll reduce resistance and increase the power."

character_skills.localised_description: "If you swing here, at the height of the parabolic angle, you'll reduce resistance and increase the power."

localised_description.last_approved_text: A wall is only as good as its foundation. Dwarf Engineers can undermine any with relative ease.

character_skills.localised_description: A wall is only as good as its foundation. Dwarf Engineers can undermine any with relative ease.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Those Engineers conversant in ballistics know how best to increase the ranges of their weapons.

character_skills.localised_description: Those Engineers conversant in ballistics know how best to increase the ranges of their weapons.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A dead eye shot is an Engineer or Thunderer that can hit a target at over five hundred (Dwarfen) paces.

character_skills.localised_description: A dead eye shot is an Engineer or Thunderer that can hit a target at over five hundred (Dwarfen) paces.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Master Engineers familiar with defensive formations use their centuries of experience in sieges.

character_skills.localised_description: Master Engineers familiar with defensive formations use their centuries of experience in sieges.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Those Engineers that spend their lives underground have a good understanding of war in the caverns.

character_skills.localised_description: Those Engineers that spend their lives underground have a good understanding of war in the caverns.

localised_description.last_approved_text: If a Master Engineer wants something, he'll get it. Quartermasters can rarely refuse a demanding Guild engineer.

character_skills.localised_description: If a Master Engineer wants something, he'll get it. Quartermasters can rarely refuse a demanding Guild engineer.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A Sapper excels at breaking entrenched foes. He can quickly get artillery into the best position.

character_skills.localised_description: A Sapper excels at breaking entrenched foes. He can quickly get artillery into the best position.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A Master Engineer knows all about firing rates, fields of fire and the best ratios, his knowledge improving efficiency.

character_skills.localised_description: A Master Engineer knows all about firing rates, fields of fire and the best ratios, his knowledge improving efficiency.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Engineers always tinker, naming these tweaks "enhancements" - most do improve whatever contraption they are working on.

character_skills.localised_description: Engineers always tinker, naming these tweaks "enhancements" - most do improve whatever contraption they are working on.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Dwarf Engineers use number-lore to work out the best trajectories and prime killing arcs for their war machines.

character_skills.localised_description: Dwarf Engineers use number-lore to work out the best trajectories and prime killing arcs for their war machines.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Master Engineer is an expert in entrenchment, able to dig-in war machines to protect them from enemy attacks.

character_skills.localised_description: The Master Engineer is an expert in entrenchment, able to dig-in war machines to protect them from enemy attacks.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A Lord and his az are never separated, for it is as much part of him as his beard.

character_skills.localised_description: A Lord and his az are never separated, for it is as much part of him as his beard.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Full of grim determination, when Dwarfs join battle there is no retreat, only victory or death.

character_skills.localised_description: Full of grim determination, when Dwarfs join battle there is no retreat, only victory or death.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A true Lord knows the Underway, his Dwarfhold and how to fight under the ground better than anyone.

character_skills.localised_description: A true Lord knows the Underway, his Dwarfhold and how to fight under the ground better than anyone.

localised_description.last_approved_text: This stubborn Dwarf refuses to yield or tire, and ensures his followers are of the same ilk.

character_skills.localised_description: This stubborn Dwarf refuses to yield or tire, and ensures his followers are of the same ilk.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Dwarfs are long-lived with many years of battlefield experience, making them excellent tacticians.

character_skills.localised_description: Dwarfs are long-lived with many years of battlefield experience, making them excellent tacticians.

localised_description.last_approved_text: This Lord knows his throng thrives in ranged combat and expects his Clansdwarfs to excel in that discipline.

character_skills.localised_description: This Lord knows his throng thrives in ranged combat and expects his Clansdwarfs to excel in that discipline.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A Dwarf Lord who revels in aerial domination insists the craft in his Airkorps are fitted with additional armour.

character_skills.localised_description: A Dwarf Lord who revels in aerial domination insists the craft in his Airkorps are fitted with additional armour.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A wise Lord will gather Engineers to his service, ensuring the Dwarfs maintain their technological edge.

character_skills.localised_description: A wise Lord will gather Engineers to his service, ensuring the Dwarfs maintain their technological edge.

localised_description.last_approved_text: "All Dwarfs to me! We have grudges to settle - Grimnir demands it!"

character_skills.localised_description: "All Dwarfs to me! We have grudges to settle - Grimnir demands it!"

localised_description.last_approved_text: Such a Dawi does not care for being wounded - by his will alone he continues to fight.

character_skills.localised_description: Such a Dawi does not care for being wounded - by his will alone he continues to fight.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Lords close to the powerful Masons' Guild will get discounts for labour and materials.

character_skills.localised_description: Lords close to the powerful Masons' Guild will get discounts for labour and materials.

localised_description.last_approved_text: This Dwarf spent time in the pits, gaining a Miner's intuition of the dangers and prey to be found in the dark.

character_skills.localised_description: This Dwarf spent time in the pits, gaining a Miner's intuition of the dangers and prey to be found in the dark.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A Dwarf with a fine beard is as Dawi as they come.

character_skills.localised_description: A Dwarf with a fine beard is as Dawi as they come.

character_skills.localised_description: Daemon Slayers seek out the most horrifying foes, those in servitude to the Ruinous Powers.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Having taken the Slayer Oath, Ungrim will stop at nothing to meet his death in battle.

character_skills.localised_description: The King of Slayers is an awe inspiring sight to every Dwarf but especially those that have taken the Slayer Oath.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Ancestor Runes are difficult to construct, but once emplaced reveal waypoints to the Dwarfen realms.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Runesmith knows more than just the traditional crafts - there are darker, lethal runes that are rarely used.

character_skills.localised_description: The Runesmith knows more than just the traditional crafts - there are darker, lethal runes that are rarely used.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Master Rune of Breaking can be a curse as well as a boon, but magic rarely flows once invoked.

character_skills.localised_description: The Master Rune of Breaking can be a curse as well as a boon, but magic rarely flows once invoked.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Invoking a Master Rune of Immolation brings utter destruction on its target - it is not to be used lightly.

localised_description.last_approved_text: An ancient Rune invented by Valaya herself to drain magical winds from the enemy.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Invoking the Rune of Shielding, an arcane mark first inscribed in the War of Vengeance, brings great protection.

localised_description.last_approved_text: It is said that Grungni and Valaya worked together to form this potent anti-magic rune.

character_skills.localised_description: It is said that Grungni and Valaya worked together to form this potent anti-magic rune.

character_skills.localised_description: The relentless drive and fury of the Hammer, harnessed for the protection of this ward’s bearer.

localised_description.last_approved_text: "We stand together! I promise I will not leave your side, brothers! Will you join me?"

localised_description.last_approved_text: To trap a fool is easy; to trap a King… perhaps even easier.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Such chiselled good looks belie a confidence that a homely face cannot parse.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Honour is everything!

character_skills.localised_description: Honour is everything!

character_skills.localised_description: A humble creature, shamed by praise and thoughtful in their dealings.

character_skills.localised_description: "This one is armless, sir."

character_skills.localised_description: "No, not drunk, just legless."

character_skills.localised_description: Born in battle, dragged up in war.

localised_description.last_approved_text: An assured air instils great confidence in your followers.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Such an ugly scar is always memorable.

character_skills.localised_description: Such an ugly scar is always memorable.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Clearly a veteran of some heroic deed.

character_skills.localised_description: Clearly a veteran of some heroic deed.

character_skills.localised_description: One of the Plague Father's creations perhaps?

localised_description.last_approved_text: Others may call it decisive, but being uncompromising can be a weakness as well as a strength.

character_skills.localised_description: Others may call it decisive, but being uncompromising can be a weakness as well as a strength.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Chaste, honourable, and untainted by notions of self-aggrandisement, King Louen is the most virtuous of all the Lady's champions.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A master of the feint and riposte, this Knight's skill at turning an enemy's strength against them is legendary.

character_skills.localised_description: A master of the feint and riposte, this Knight's skill at turning an enemy's strength against them is legendary.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Haughty, proud, and skilful, this Knight never takes a backward step in the face of adversity.

character_skills.localised_description: Haughty, proud, and skilful, this Knight never takes a backward step in the face of adversity.

localised_description.last_approved_text: No matter the odds, this Knight takes to the field utterly undaunted by the numberless hordes of his enemies.

character_skills.localised_description: No matter the odds, this Knight takes to the field utterly undaunted by the numberless hordes of his enemies.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Most loyal of Companions, this Knight fights always at the side of his Liege.

character_skills.localised_description: Most loyal of Companions, this Knight fights always at the side of his Liege.

localised_description.last_approved_text: This Knight's skill, prowess, and finesse with blade and lance are beyond compare; his bravery, horsemanship, and chivalry above all others.

character_skills.localised_description: This Knight's skill, prowess, and finesse with blade and lance are beyond compare; his bravery, horsemanship, and chivalry above all others.

localised_description.last_approved_text: In the glory of the charge is this Knight most alive, ever in the forefront of battle.

character_skills.localised_description: In the glory of the charge is this Knight most alive, ever in the forefront of battle.

localised_description.last_approved_text: So great is this Knight's skill with a lance that none can unhorse them.

character_skills.localised_description: So great is this Knight's skill with a lance that none can unhorse them.

localised_description.last_approved_text: With a heart of stone and resolute temper this Knight stands unbowed, spilling the foe's blood with each sweep and thrust.

localised_description.last_approved_text: This Knight has great contempt for those who eschew the martial values of meeting one's opponent face to face.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A hermit-Knight, this one nevertheless always returns to fight for his beloved King.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Steeled by this Knight's bravery, those around them fight with the courage of the Breton himself.

character_skills.localised_description: Steeled by this Knight's bravery, those around them fight with the courage of the Breton himself.

localised_description.last_approved_text: "I will be the axis upon which the wheel of change turns, and the world will drown in the light of unborn stars."

character_skills.localised_description: "I will be the axis upon which the wheel of change turns, and the world will drown in the light of unborn stars."

localised_description.last_approved_text: Oh, horrific wonder! Vile awe! Such hateful majesty!

character_skills.localised_description: Oh, horrific wonder! Vile awe! Such hateful majesty!

localised_description.last_approved_text: "Mine desire is all, mortal wretch!"

character_skills.localised_description: "Mine desire is all, mortal wretch!"

localised_description.last_approved_text: "The whole world will burn before I rest again."

character_skills.localised_description: "The whole world will burn before I rest again."

localised_description.last_approved_text: "Surely such sedition should sour and succumb to Sigvald!"

character_skills.localised_description: "Surely such sedition should sour and succumb to Sigvald!"

localised_description.last_approved_text: "This is my edict as High King! Khazukan Kazakit-ha!"

localised_description.last_approved_text: "Bring me victory, bring me death!"

character_skills.localised_description: "Bring me victory, bring me death!"

character_skills.localised_description: "The Wind of Chamon will rise and blast any who get in my way!"

localised_description.last_approved_text: "Our names will be remembered in our people's songs until the end of time!"

localised_description.last_approved_text: "Dere choppa's bigga dan mine."

localised_description.last_approved_text: "Everyfing I see is mine."

localised_description.last_approved_text: "Dat stabba is longa dan mine!"

localised_description.last_approved_text: Some Vampires have an affinity for Necromantic magic beyond their peers.

character_skills.localised_description: Some Vampires have an affinity for Necromantic magic beyond their peers.

localised_description.last_approved_text: "They flock to you - the ghoul-kind. Direct them as you will."

character_skills.localised_description: "They flock to you - the ghoul-kind. Direct them as you will."

localised_description.last_approved_text: "You and your masters are desiccated relics of a dead age."

localised_description.last_approved_text: "My people will feast on your bones."

localised_description.last_approved_text: Replicated by Runesmiths from a single scale wedged between the teeth of a slain Chaos Lord at the pivotal Battle of Thraag, the White Dwarf's armour is able to deflect even the hardest blows.
